select oi.id, oi.code, oi.pharmacy_id, oi.total_cost, oi.user_id, oi.create_date, oi.logistics_id, oi.order_status, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address AS userAddress, phi.name AS pharmacyName, phi.address, phi.legal_person, phi.phone as pharmacyPhone from order_info oi left join pharmacy_info phi on (phi.id = oi.pharmacy_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
AND phi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.pharmacyName},'%')
order by oi.create_date desc

select oi.id, oi.code, oi.pharmacy_id, oi.total_cost, oi.user_id, oi.create_date, oi.logistics_id, oi.order_status, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address AS userAddress, phi.name AS pharmacyName, phi.address from order_info oi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
